mapper.select: SELECT STF_NO, STF_NM, STF_GENDER , STF_PROFILE, STF_COUNTRY, STF_ADDR , STF_TEL, STF_EMAIL, STF_JOIN_DT , STF_STATUS, STF_DEPT_NO, STF_PW FROM STAFF
SELECT STF_NO, STF_NM, STF_GENDER , STF_PROFILE, STF_COUNTRY, STF_ADDR , STF_TEL, STF_EMAIL, STF_JOIN_DT , STF_STATUS, STF_DEPT_NO, STF_PW FROM STAFF WHERE STF_NO = #{stfNo}
